name: Slime Dungeon (itch) (palloma)
description:
A game made for Mix and Game Jam, with the theme "Mixing Genres".
Our game combines the mechanics of a roguelike with the classic snake game.
Instead of the player playing with the snake, he plays with a slime that must survive the attacks of the heroes inside de dungeon.
Art Designer: Paloma Morais
Programmer: Vinicius Alves
